name: Flame Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Heated Body
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the flame dragon or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.
